content.description: It is no longer possible to update Peakboard Boxes up to ID PB6999. Contact sales@peakboard.com for questions or assistance with an upgrade.
The reload flows have been completely revised and now offer the option of executing scripts in addition to reloading data sources.
The Microsoft data sources have been expanded to include new data sources such as Mail, Teams and To-Do lists, and the existing Office data sources Calendar and SharePoint lists have been revised.
Colour gradients have been introduced for rectangles, circles, lines and the screen background.

list_items: Added a property for defining alternative names for certificates.
Fixed a bug preventing the addition of a Peakboard Box, with pbadmin and no other user.
Fixed wrong description for API endpoint /Device/CheckTime.
Fixed an error when uploading a package with "set on upload" variables.
Full blocking of port 40404 is now possible.
Peakboard Boxes now uses everytime a unified HttpClient, with the proxy settings.
Upon establishing a secure connection, unnecessary HTTP calls to port 40404 are now blocked.
Single tenant authentication is now allowed.
Fixed a bug where adding a chart with a time series and duplicate datetimes caused an error.
Fixed a bug where creating a conditional formatting and connecting to a number column, then switching to a boolean column.
Operators have been matched to the data type of the column and "Contains," "StartWith," and "EndWith" added for string columns.
Pressing the enter key while the data source selection popup is open will now select the highlighted data source instead of closing the entire dialog.
Shared connections are now grouped by type and name after creation.
Data grid for Headers now saves them when clicking into whitespace.
Fixed a bug where join columns where not saved correctly.
Fixed an issue where reopening a periodic dataflow resulted in overlapping intervals between sources.
The time filter with a time data source no longer requires an input format.
Added an option to choose a gradient for a screen background.
Additional options have been added to the recent files section.
Adjusted paste offsets to 20px to fit to the grid; new controls are now added with at 40px top and left.
Background image opacity is now adjustable in percentages (0-100) rather than the previous scale (0.1 - 1).
Fixed a bug where double-clicking a renamed file did not update the project title.
Fixed a bug where the video tutorials link in English directed to an outdated URL.
Removed unnecessary property from the screen.
Switching the designer language now updates the YouTube videos on the home screen.
The splash screen now displays loading step texts instead of separate dialogs when a user opens a pbmx file directly.
The version warning popup now opens in front of the splash screen instead of behind it.
Updated the style of the embedded editor for databases, SAP, and webviews.
Changing the data source of a dropdown no longer causes the data/value databinding to be lost.
Data/value data binding is now possible with number variables/columns when the data source of the dropdown is a number column.
Users can now differentiate between the display value and data value.
Fixed an issue where not every text was displayed.
All errors in extensions are now shown in the runtime log.
Functions can now be duplicated.
Renaming a global function will now rename it on every place.
Fixed a bug where copy-pasting a function would overwrite existing function calls, resulting in them calling the pasted function instead of the original.
Fixed a bug where editing a function script and adding a parameter before saving would delete the script changes.
Fixed a bug where copy-pasting a group with conditional formatting would result in the pasted group losing the conditional formatting.
Fixed a bug where reloading hub lists in the datasource dialog would result in the loss of filters.
Searching for hub lists by entering text is now possible.
Cookies headers can now be defined.
Fixed a bug where columns with '.' in their names did not work.
Initial implementation.
Prevent updates to Peakboard Boxes smaller than PB7000.
Reworked the logging section in the box management dialog.
Upgraded ManagementService and WebServer to .NET 8.
Fixed a bug happend by the upload button in the box management dialog.
Fixed a bug where pbadmin would become unusable if the users.json file is empty.
Fixed an error occurring when uploading PBMX via cloud connection.
Fixed an issue where an initial PeakboardAdmin without a password would prevent adding a new user from pbadmin.
Fixed an issue where the timerscript stopped working.
Fixed an error that occurred when synchronizing with Peakboard Hub when no Boxes were there.
Fixed a bug where the update filters in the Building Block could not be used.
Ellipse and Line now allow the definition of a gradient.
Full rework.
Local resources can now be set by name instead of by path in scripting.
Users can now add multiple resources at once.
Fixed an issue where UDT would not work when used as a global UDT outside of a program.
Added a separate category for peakboard.log() logs.
Fixed a bug where the "addmonth()" snippet threw an error when the current date was a day in November.
Reworked runtime logging.
The log window is now movable within the preview.
Users can now jump between different textboxes using the Tab key in the runtime environment.
Full rework.
Controls inside the styled tile collection or styled lists can now be accessed in Building Blocks.
Fixed a bug where stored procedure lost content.
Columns are now bound to the name of the data source instead of the technical name.
The text control can not be set to scrollable.
Fixed a bug where the text changed event does not trigger when bound to a variable.
Improved the performance.
Fixed error associated with adding a local resource in the image control within a styled list.
Fixed error occurring when changing the orientation twice.
Initial implementation.
Fixed a bug where lists set to be stored on the box do not work anymore.
Increased the window height.
The ability to connect variables to the Peakboard Hub has been improved.
Fixed a bug where running a function with a number parameter did not work.
Fixed a bug where values were lost on the second reload of data.
